title: Authors and Citation
text: Everitt R (2024). ggsmc: Visualising output SMC samplers EnK methods.. https://github.com/richardgeveritt/ggsmc, https://richardgeveritt.github.io/ggsmc/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {ggsmc: Visualising output from SMC samplers and EnK methods.},   author = {Richard Everitt},   year = {2024},   note = {https://github.com/richardgeveritt/ggsmc, https://richardgeveritt.github.io/ggsmc/}, }

what: Visualising output from SMC samplers and EnK methods.
title: Visualising output from SMC samplers and EnK methods.
text: Visualising output SMC samplers EnK methods.

what: An animated histogram of a single variable across targets. — animated_histogram
title: An animated histogram of a single variable across targets. — animated_histogram
text: animated histogram single variable across targets.

title: An animated histogram of a single variable across targets. — animated_histogram
code: animated_histogram(   output,   parameter,   dimension = 1,   target = NULL,   external_target = NULL,   use_initial_points = TRUE,   use_weights = TRUE,   bins = 30,   xlimits = NULL,   ylimits = NULL,   default_title = FALSE,   duration = NULL,   animate_plot = TRUE,   save_filename = NULL,   save_path = NULL )

title: An animated histogram of a single variable across targets. — animated_histogram
text: output Output SMC EnK algorithm. parameter parameter wish histogram. dimension (optional) dimension parameter wish histogram. (default 1) target (optionaL) specified, fix target, animate ExternalTarget (present output). external_target (optionaL) specified, fix external_target, animate Target. use_initial_points (optional) target specified argument TRUE, add initial unweighted proposed points output plotted. (default TRUE) use_weights (optional) FALSE, ignore particle weights histogram. TRUE, use particle weights. (defaults TRUE) bins (optional) Number bins histogram. (default 30) xlimits (optional) Input form c(start,end), specifies ends x-axis. ylimits (optional) Input form c(start,end), specifies ends y-axis. default_title (optional) TRUE, provide default title figure. FALSE, title used. (defaults FALSE) duration (optional) duration animation. (defaults producing animation uses 10 frames per second) animate_plot (optiional) TRUE, return animation. FALSE, returns gganim object can furher modified animating. (defaults FALSE) save_filename (optional) specified, animation saved gif filename. (default save) save_path (optional) specified along save_filename, save gif save_path/save_filename. (defaults working directory)

title: An animated histogram of a single variable across targets. — animated_histogram
text: animated histogram

what: Plot animated line graph showing parameter value vs dimension (revealed in tthe animation) from algorithm output. — animated_reveal_time_series_line_graph
title: Plot animated line graph showing parameter value vs dimension (revealed in tthe animation) from algorithm output. — animated_reveal_time_series_line_graph
text: Plot animated line graph showing parameter value vs dimension (revealed tthe animation) algorithm output.

title: Plot animated line graph showing parameter value vs dimension (revealed in tthe animation) from algorithm output. — animated_reveal_time_series_line_graph
code: animated_reveal_time_series_line_graph(   output,   parameters,   target = NULL,   external_target = NULL,   use_initial_points = TRUE,   use_weights = TRUE,   max_line_width = 1,   alpha = 0.1,   xlimits = NULL,   ylimits = NULL,   default_title = FALSE,   duration = NULL,   animate_plot = TRUE,   save_filename = NULL,   save_path = NULL )

title: Plot animated line graph showing parameter value vs dimension (revealed in tthe animation) from algorithm output. — animated_reveal_time_series_line_graph
text: output Output SMC EnK algorithm. parameters parameters wish y-axis line graph. target (optional) target plot. (default use targets) external_target (optional) external target plot. (default use external targets, ignore column present) use_initial_points (optional) target specified argument TRUE, add initial unweighted proposed points output plotted. (default TRUE) use_weights (optional) FALSE, ignore particle weights line graph. TRUE, use particle weights. (defaults TRUE) max_line_width (optional) maximum size points plot. (default=1) alpha (optional) transparency lines plot. (default=0.1) xlimits (optional) Input form c(start,end), specifies ends x-axis. ylimits (optional) Input form c(start,end), specifies ends y-axis. default_title (optional) TRUE, provide default title figure. FALSE, title used. (defaults FALSE) duration (optional) duration animation. (defaults producing animation uses 10 frames per second) animate_plot (optiional) TRUE, return animation. FALSE, returns gganim object can furher modified animating. (defaults FALSE) save_filename (optional) specified, animation saved gif filename. (default save) save_path (optional) specified along save_filename, save gif save_path/save_filename. (defaults working directory)

title: Plot animated line graph showing parameter value vs dimension (revealed in tthe animation) from algorithm output. — animated_reveal_time_series_line_graph
text: animated line graph, successively adds points along time axis.

what: A histogram of a single variable from a single target. — animated_scatter_plot
title: A histogram of a single variable from a single target. — animated_scatter_plot
text: histogram single variable single target.

title: A histogram of a single variable from a single target. — animated_scatter_plot
code: animated_scatter_plot(   output,   x_parameter,   x_dimension,   y_parameter,   y_dimension,   target = NULL,   external_target = NULL,   use_initial_points = TRUE,   use_weights = TRUE,   max_size = 1,   alpha = 0.1,   xlimits = NULL,   ylimits = NULL,   default_title = FALSE,   view_follow = FALSE,   shadow_mark_proportion_of_max_size = NULL,   shadow_wake_length = NULL,   duration = NULL,   animate_plot = TRUE,   save_filename = NULL,   save_path = NULL )

title: A histogram of a single variable from a single target. — animated_scatter_plot
text: output Output SMC EnK algorithm. x_parameter parameter indexed x-axis. x_dimension (optional) dimension x-parameter wish histogram. (default 1) y_parameter parameter indexed y-axis. y_dimension (optional) dimension y-parameter wish histogram. (default 1) target (optionaL) specified, fix target, animate ExternalTarget (present output). external_target (optionaL) specified, fix external_target, animate Target. use_initial_points (optional) target specified argument TRUE, add initial unweighted proposed points output plotted. (default TRUE) use_weights (optional) FALSE, ignore particle weights scatter plot. TRUE, use particle weights. (defaults TRUE) max_size (optional) maximum size points plot. (default=1) alpha (optional) transparency points plot. (default=0.1) xlimits (optional) Input form c(start,end), specifies ends x-axis. ylimits (optional) Input form c(start,end), specifies ends y-axis. default_title (optional) TRUE, provide default title figure. FALSE, title used. (defaults FALSE) view_follow (optional) TRUE, view follow particles. (default FALSE) shadow_mark_proportion_of_max_size (optional) set, animation leave behind shadow points, size (transparency) specified proportion. (default set) shadow_wake_length (optional) set, animation leave shadow wake behind point, duration given parameter (proportion entire animation length). (default set) duration (optional) duration animation. (defaults producing animation uses 10 frames per second) animate_plot (optiional) TRUE, return animation. FALSE, returns gganim object can furher modified animating. (defaults FALSE) save_filename (optional) specified, animation saved gif filename. (default save) save_path (optional) specified along save_filename, save gif save_path/save_filename. (defaults working directory)

title: A histogram of a single variable from a single target. — animated_scatter_plot
text: scatter plot ggplot figure.

what: Plot an SMC or EnK genealogy from algorithm output. — genealogy
title: Plot an SMC or EnK genealogy from algorithm output. — genealogy
text: Plot SMC EnK genealogy algorithm output.

title: Plot an SMC or EnK genealogy from algorithm output. — genealogy
code: genealogy(   output,   parameter,   dimension = 1,   target = NULL,   external_target = NULL,   use_initial_points = TRUE,   use_weights = TRUE,   alpha_points = 0.1,   alpha_lines = 0.1,   axis_limits = NULL,   vertical = TRUE,   arrows = TRUE,   default_title = FALSE )

title: Plot an SMC or EnK genealogy from algorithm output. — genealogy
text: output Output SMC EnK algorithm. parameter parameter wish see evolution . dimension (optional) dimension parameter wish see evolution . (default 1) target (optional) target plot. (default use targets) external_target (optional) external target plot. (default use external targets, ignore column present) use_initial_points (optional) target specified argument TRUE, add initial unweighted proposed points output plotted. (default TRUE) use_weights (optional) FALSE, ignore particle weights line graph. TRUE, use particle weights. (defaults TRUE) alpha_points (optional) transparency points plot. (default=0.1) alpha_lines (optional) transparency lines plot. (default=0.1) axis_limits (optional) Input form c(start,end), specifies ends parameter axis. vertical (optional) TRUE (default), plots genealogy vertically. FALSE, plots horizontally. arrows (optional) TRUE (default), includes arrowheads. FALSE, arrowheads omitted. default_title (optional) TRUE, provide default title figure. FALSE, title used. (defaults FALSE)

title: Plot an SMC or EnK genealogy from algorithm output. — genealogy
text: particle genealogy ggplot figure.
